vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: newMessage in Log.addMessage (patch_3.sol#50) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.deposit (patch_3.sol#16-21):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.addMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_3.sol#19)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastBlock (patch_3.sol#20)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
external-function
external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_3.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_3.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in ETH_FUND.cashOut (patch_3.sol#23-32):
	-msg.sender.call.value(_am)() patch_3.sol#27-31
